Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after); LATE PERIOD (not before)
Name: Figure from a mummy-bead net: textcolumn with Anubis
Description: The object is a figure that was originally incorporated in a large bead net, consisting of cylindrical beads with (at least) ten figures made of smaller beads. This is a vertical column of text, topped with a reclining Anubis, facing left in concordance with the direction of the hieroglyphs. Some cylindrical beads, part of the bead net, are still attached to the column.
